projects.description: Caev is an online platform which allow its users to cater food. This platform was created using React (Typescript) and Redux for the frontend and NodeJS/MySql for the backend with hosting on AWS.  One of the most enjoyable parts of this project was being able to work with many talented developers and a stellar management team to craft an experience which solves the issues of catering food on campus or for local events.
projects.subtitle: Cater to events
projects.title: Caev

projects.description: Tired of waiting 40+ minutes to convert my a single power point file into an audio file one I decided to create a faster way.  Luckily, the audio from a pptx file is easily recoverable and Python had a library called PyDub which uses ffmpeg to combine the audio files into one made this project not as challenging.  In order to increase the challenge I decided to create this project as a web  app and in the process learend about dealing with files over the web and how to store / remove them from the server once the user got what they wanted.
projects.subtitle: Extract all audio from a power point
projects.title: PPTX Sound Extractor
